charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to custody of U.S. Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 84 months. Court recommends defendant to be housed at FCI-Butner or other facility that provides psychological treatment, especially for gambling addiction, and that he receive such treatment. Supervised Release for a term of 3 years. Special Assessment of $100.00 to be paid in full immediately. (1)

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)-Use of a Firearm During a Violent Crime; 18:2-Aiding and Abetting (2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on Motion of the United States. (2)

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)-Possession of Firearm by Convicted Felon; 18:2-Aiding and Abetting (3)

charges.charge_disposition: Dismissed on Motion of the United States. (3)
